thread.section_title: Ibis Styles Paris Gare de l'Est Chateau Landon - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The Worst hotel in the world!!!
thread.title_full: The Worst hotel in the world!!! - Review of Ibis Styles Paris Gare de l'Est Chateau Landon, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Maria D
title: The Worst hotel in the world!!!
text:
We stayed there 5 days in February and we paid 500euros.
Our room was awful, our towels and pillows was dirty and when we asked how often do you change it, they told us that we do not change it only we fold it and we put the same.
But the worst thing was that we gave them some clothes only to wash it and we paid 250EUROS just for 2 jeans, 4 T-shirt and 6 pair of socks. For the same clothes 6 days before we had paid in England only 10pounds.
The only thing that was good there was the breakfast nothing else. NOBODY GOES THERE!!!!
